body_html: One way to validate this might be to manually replicate your database with shuffling several times (since the dataset is small this shouldn't be too bad), and see whether tf.train.batch is still worse than tf.train.shuffle_batch on the original dataset.
body_text: One way to validate this might be to manually replicate your database with shuffling several times (since the dataset is small this shouldn't be too bad), and see whether tf.train.batch is still worse than tf.train.shuffle_batch on the original dataset.
